sn22.119:4.2: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassathā”ti?
sn22.119:4.5: Rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn22.119:4.9: viññāṇaṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassathā”ti?
sn22.119:4.12: Viññāṇaṃ, bhikkhave, ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ …
